price: Dhugaan Gooftaa kee irraayi, Kanaafuu warra shakkan irraa hin ta’in.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
